Method Detail

endLoop

public void endLoop()
To be override if you extend this class This method will be called each time this track reach the its end

add

public void add(USequence s)
Add new sequence to this track

Parameters:
s - The sequence to add to

add

public void add(UNote n)
Add notes straight to the track without using a sequence object. Keep in mind that this should be considered a shortcut and it will be used the first sequence in the sequence's array, automatically created if not present.

Parameters:
n - the UNote object to add

reset

public void reset()
Reset this track, by deleting all the sequences present

remove

public void remove(USequence s)
Remove a sequence reference from this track

Parameters:
s - The USequence reference to remove

remove

public void remove(int _i)
Remove a sequence from this track, using its index position in the sequences array

Parameters:
_i - The index position in the array

setDuration

public void setDuration(int d)
Set a fixed duration of this track Every sequences duration will be mapped to the new duration

Parameters:
d - The new duration in milliseconds

getPosition

public float getPosition()
Get the normalized time position of the header of this track

Returns:
The normalized value

public void updateDuration()
Called from USequence object on duration changes and on add sequence to this track
